identified-content.object.title: Advertising (Times Column)
identified-content.classifier: Top/Classifieds/Job Market/Job Categories/Marketing, Advertising and PR

abstract.p: Dennis Eastham is named chief executive of Brann Worldwide, succeeding Chris Gater, who continues as chairman; Marty Schwalbe is named to new post of executive vice president and director for brand strategy at HMS Partners; John Roderick is named to head new division at Rosen Group as managing director (S)

block.p: * Dennis Eastham, president and chief operating officer at Brann Worldwide, Deerfield, Ill., part of Snyder Communications, was named chief executive, succeeding Chris Gater, who continues as chairman. * Marty Schwalbe was named to the new post of executive vice president and director for brand strategy at HMS Partners, Columbus, Ohio. He had been executive vice president and corporate director for strategy and convergence at Fahlgren, Dublin, Ohio.

* Dennis Eastham, president and chief operating officer at Brann Worldwide, Deerfield, Ill., part of Snyder Communications, was named chief executive, succeeding Chris Gater, who continues as chairman. * Marty Schwalbe was named to the new post of executive vice president and director for brand strategy at HMS Partners, Columbus, Ohio. He had been executive vice president and corporate director for strategy and convergence at Fahlgren, Dublin, Ohio.
* John Roderick, account executive at the Rosen Group, New York, was named to head a new division, Rosen Interactive, as managing director.
